subsection.name: 2.4 Compiling from Source
subsection.panel: Normally users don't need to build Cayenne from source. All required prebuilt JAR's are included with the distribution.
subsection.p: If there is a need to rebuild Cayenne with custom modifications, the best way to do that is to check out the source from anonymous CVS (preferred way) or to download one of the latest stable or development CVS snapshots. See Developer Guide for details on how to build Cayenne. However since CVS checkout contains all needed dependencies (except for Java and Ant), this should be very easy:
subsection.panel: Cayenne Team discontinued shipping "build.xml" file with Cayenne distribution to avoid maintaining two parallel build systems, and reduce confusion.
